document_data.caption: Two varieties of aquatic armors worn by [[Aquatic elf|aquatic elves]], showing chitin armor on the right.
document_data.name: Chitin armor
document_data.mainbody: '''Chitin armor''' ({{Pronounce|KITE|in|refs={{Cite web/Dungeons & Dragons FAQ}}}}) was made from the shells of chitinous creatures such as [[ankheg]], [[giant crab]]s, or [[remorhaz]]. It was flexible and could be comfortable, and was known to be used by [[aquatic elf|aquatic elves]] and some savage cultures. The armor was valued around 75 gp and weighed 20 lb (10 kg).
